name: lss0ss
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3
body: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2)), wss(csn(c3), c1))

stmt.origin: snssd(c3, c1, wa(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2)), wss(csn(c3), c1))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2)), wss(csn(c3), c1))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, c1))

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, c1))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(c0g, c0))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(clss, c0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2)), wss(csn(c3), c1))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(c0g, c0))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(clss, c0))

comment: The zero subspace is included in every subspace. ( ~ sh0le analog.) (Contributed by NM, 27-Mar-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 19-Jun-2014.)
